channel.title: Scheduling on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Your new robo-assistant, Amy Ingram
item.description: Every day, computers are making people easier and easier to use. (David Tempkin, In Formation) x.ai has a new service in development, an automated personal assistant that helps you schedule meetings. You give it - or I should say “her”, because the bot’s name is Amy Ingram - you give Amy your calendar and some simple instructions, and “she” manages the correspondence with the person you’re trying to meet with.
